label: 公事
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Miscellaneous dues levied on the individual cultivator, paid in non-rice products, labor, and other service. Zōkuji (all kuji) puls buyaku (labor service). Nengu and kuji together comprised the annual levy on the peasantry.　[雑公事、夫役、年貢]
